name: Staphylococcus aureus
input: Gram-positive cocci in clusters, catalase positive, coagulase positive, beta-haemolytic on blood agar. Grows at 37 °C aerobically. Ferments glucose, mannitol and sucrose but not lactose. DNase positive, VP positive, MR negative, citrate negative, oxidase negative, indole negative, urease variable. NaCl tolerant up to 7%.

name: Salmonella enterica
input: Gram-negative rods, motile, non-spore-forming. Oxidase negative, catalase positive, indole negative, urease negative. MR positive, VP negative, citrate positive. Produces H₂S, reduces nitrate. Grows at 37 °C under facultative anaerobic conditions. Ferments glucose, mannitol, xylose and arabinose but not lactose, sucrose or raffinose. ONPG negative, lysine decarboxylase positive.

name: Listeria monocytogenes
input: Gram-positive short rods, catalase positive, oxidase negative, motile at 25 °C, non-spore-forming, beta-haemolytic on blood agar, grows on ALOA. MR negative, VP positive, citrate negative. Ferments glucose, maltose, rhamnose, but not xylose. Esculin hydrolysis positive, nitrate negative.

name: Enterobacter cloacae
input: Gram-negative rod, motile, oxidase negative, catalase positive. Indole negative, citrate positive, VP positive, MR negative, urease positive, ONPG positive, nitrate reduction positive. Grows on MacConkey agar as pink colonies. Ferments glucose, lactose, sucrose and mannitol. Aerobic or facultative anaerobic.

name: Pseudomonas aeruginosa
input: Gram-negative rods, motile, oxidase positive, catalase positive, non-fermentative, grows on Nutrient agar and MacConkey agar forming green colonies. Produces pyocyanin. Citrate positive, MR negative, VP negative, indole negative, urease negative. Aerobic, 37 °C. Gelatin hydrolysis positive, DNase positive.

name: Staphylococcus aureus
input: Gram-positive cocci in clusters, catalase positive, coagulase positive, beta-haemolytic on blood agar. Grows at 37 °C aerobically. Ferments glucose, mannitol and sucrose but not lactose. DNase positive, VP positive, MR negative, citrate negative, oxidase negative, indole negative, urease variable. NaCl tolerant up to 7%.

name: Streptococcus pyogenes
input: Gram-positive cocci in chains, catalase negative, beta-haemolysis on blood agar. PYR test positive, bacitracin sensitive. Esculin hydrolysis negative. Facultative anaerobe, grows at 37 °C.

name: Enterococcus faecalis
input: Gram-positive cocci, catalase negative, non-haemolytic or weak beta-haemolytic. Grows at 45 °C, in 6.5% NaCl and at pH 9.6. PYR positive, bile esculin positive. Ferments glucose and lactose, but not mannitol or xylose.

name: Bacillus subtilis
input: Gram-positive rods, catalase positive, spore-forming, aerobic. Colonies dry, white and irregular on nutrient agar. Oxidase positive, indole negative, citrate positive, motile. Grows well at 30 °C and 45 °C.

name: Listeria monocytogenes
input: Gram-positive short rods, catalase positive, non-spore forming. Grows at 4 °C but not at 45 °C. Beta-haemolysis on blood agar and shows tumbling motility. Esculin hydrolysis positive.

name: Salmonella enterica
input: Gram-negative rod, motile, oxidase negative, catalase positive, produces H2S on XLD agar. Colonies small, black centred. Ferments glucose, mannitol and xylose but not lactose or sucrose. Indole negative, citrate positive, urease negative. Facultative anaerobe.

name: Shigella flexneri
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase negative, non-motile, non-H2S producing. Ferments glucose but not lactose, mannitol or xylose. Indole positive, urease negative, citrate negative.

name: Escherichia coli
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase negative, indole positive, citrate negative, urease negative. Ferments glucose, lactose, mannitol and sorbitol with acid production. Beta-haemolysis may be present. Facultative anaerobe.

name: Klebsiella pneumoniae
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase negative, catalase positive, non-motile, capsule positive, urease positive, citrate positive, indole negative. Ferments glucose and lactose, but not xylose. Colonies are mucoid and pink on MacConkey agar.

name: Enterobacter cloacae
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase negative, catalase positive, motile. Indole negative, urease positive, citrate positive, VP positive, MR negative. Esculin hydrolysis positive. Ferments glucose, mannitol and lactose. Grows on nutrient agar at 37 °C.

name: Proteus mirabilis
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase negative, catalase positive, urease positive, indole negative, citrate positive, motile with swarming growth. Produces H2S. Ferments glucose and sucrose but not lactose or arabinose. Grows on MacConkey agar.

name: Pseudomonas aeruginosa
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase positive, catalase positive, non-fermenter on MacConkey agar. Produces green pigment and fruity odour. Motile. Grows at 42 °C aerobically.

name: Vibrio cholerae
input: Gram-negative curved rods, oxidase positive, catalase positive, grows on TCBS agar forming yellow colonies. Ferments sucrose and mannitol but not lactose. Motile by polar flagella.

name: Neisseria gonorrhoeae
input: Gram-negative diplococci, oxidase positive, catalase positive, non-motile. Grows on chocolate agar and Thayer Martin agar. Capnophilic and fastidious. Does not grow on nutrient agar.

name: Campylobacter jejuni
input: Gram-negative curved rods, oxidase positive, catalase positive, microaerophilic, motile with darting movement. Grows at 42 °C but not at 25 °C. Does not ferment carbohydrates.

name: Clostridium perfringens
input: Gram-positive rods, spore forming, anaerobic. Catalase negative, oxidase negative, indole negative. Produces double zone haemolysis on blood agar. Ferments glucose and lactose.

name: Corynebacterium diphtheriae
input: Gram-positive pleomorphic rods, catalase positive, non-motile, non-spore forming. Aerobic growth. Produces grey-black colonies on tellurite blood agar. Ferments glucose and maltose but not sucrose.

name: Legionella pneumophila
input: Gram-negative rods, oxidase positive, catalase positive, aerobic, non-fermenter. Requires L-cysteine and iron for growth. Grows on BCYE agar at 37 °C, not on nutrient agar. Motile.

name: Mycobacterium tuberculosis
input: Gram-positive slender rods, acid-fast, catalase positive, non-motile, obligate aerobe. Grows slowly on Lowenstein-Jensen medium forming rough, buff colonies. Does not ferment carbohydrates.

name: Bacteroides fragilis
input: Gram-negative rods, anaerobic, catalase positive, indole variable, non-spore forming. Resistant to bile. Grows on Bacteroides bile esculin agar forming black colonies.
